content.query:
------------------------
-- Calendar
------------------------
CREATE VIEW gold.calendar
AS
SELECT 
    * 
FROM 
    OPENROWSET
        (
            BULK 'https://advsalesworks.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        ) as QUERY1


------------------------
-- Customers
------------------------
CREATE VIEW gold.customers
AS
SELECT 
    * 
FROM 
    OPENROWSET
        (
            BULK 'https://advsalesworks.blob.core.windows.net/silver/AdventureWorks_Customers/',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        ) as QUERY1
